comment: My favorite professor I have had so far and such an awesome guy! This is a professor who genuinely cares about his students and will do everything to make sure you pass. Easy grader if you do the requirements and ALWAYS gives positive feedback. If you get the chance, take his classes!

He is incredibly unwary of time. His instruction and expectation of assignments are incredibly unclear. Near the end of the semester, when all of our projects were due, he REFUSED to give a concrete answer to any clarifying question. He is an incredibly tough grader, and without real reason. Not worth the credit. I almost got my first B.

He took a different approach to writing with the topic of creativity for the entire semester. He was super personable and encouraged us to interact with one another with various activities that challenged us to think about things from other perspectives. There's three main projects throughout the semester where if you show effort, you'll get an A.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--GRADED BY FEW THINGS

comment: He is not specific about anything and very hard to access outside the class. He gives custom writing assignments that teaches you nothing and wastes your time. It is a very boring class where you get even more frustrated with his uncertainty and ambiguity. Don't take him.

This man put us in groups every single class period without fail. He wasn't a bad teacher other than that, very helpful, but I am just not a very sociable person so this was a problem for me. If you don't mind groups every day, he is probably a great professor for you

This class is so easy and fun. Defiantly take it if youre looking for a class to make friends. Even if you dont want to make friends, youre going to make friends because the class is so open and welcoming. We only used the textbook 1-3 times but trust me you dont need it. Only 3 projects throughout the semester and they were easy.

Each semester he gives the students a theme which we explore throughout the class. There are no tests or quizzes. Most assignments are papers or presentations and he gives good feedback that helps us understand what we need to do to improve our writing. The class is fun and he creates an environment in which it easy to get to know each other.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--GRADED BY FEW THINGS

comment: DO NOT EVER TAKE HIM. HE IS THE MOST CONFUSING PROFESSOR I HAVE EVER MET. HE ALSO GRADE HARD EVEN WE GET FEEDBACK BEFORE GRADING TO IMPROVE, OUR WHOLE CLASSMATES DO NOT UNDERSTAND WHAT HE WANTS TO GET AN A. HE IS IN LOVE WITH CREATIVITY. HE WANTS YOU TO BE AN EXPERT IN CREATIVITY. SERIOUSLY, DO NOT TAKE HIM
